mireka.transmission.queue

Class TransmitterSummary

  • Object
    • mireka.transmission.queue.TransmitterSummary
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TransmitterSummaryMBean

    public class TransmitterSummary
extends Object
implements TransmitterSummaryMBean
    TransmitterSummary holds and publishes statistics data about the mail transactions of a QueuingTransmitter.
